author: Robert Hackett
description: Investors include HSBC, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, and more.
title: Intel and Big Banks Put $100 Million in Finance Tech Firm R3

author: Hugh Son
description: Morgan Stanley said it will cut back on using recruitment bonuses to poach established financial advisers after Bank of America Corp. and UBS Group AG signaled similar moves.
title: Morgan Stanley to ‘Significantly Reduce’ Recruiting of Brokers

author: Laura J Keller
description: Wells Fargo & Co. will pay bigger sign-on bonuses to some new brokers as competitors including Morgan Stanley and Bank of America Corp. seek to reduce recruitment inducements.
title: Wells Fargo to Boost Broker Sign-On Bonuses as Rivals Cut Back
